entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6 except low minus 9 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6 except low minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
